fulltext:
Võ Thị Thuý Hạnh
Date of birth:
 March 27th, 1995
Gender:  Female
Phone:
 (+84) 767-154-900
Email:  hanhvo.ussh@gmail.com
Address:
 Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Website:  https://www.linkedin.com/in/jolie-hanhvo/
WORK EXPERIENCE
Jan 2017 - Now
Onaclover Technology Joint Stock Company
Information System Management Senior & Data Analyst Executive
Main responsibilities:
- Recruit, training and manage ISM team.
- Use holistics.io tool to access and analyze data sets and present
analytical findings in reports, summaries, dashboards, graphs, charts
and maps by querying SQL statements.
- Measure operational efficiency & cost metric.
- Use Holistic tool to transform data from CMS to Google Spreadsheet
and import data from Google Spreadsheet on Holistic.
- Build the system to measure the importance and happiness of
partners.
- Query data and give information for other teams requests.
Jun 2017 - Dec 2017
Onaclover Technology Joint Stock Company
Information System Management Junior
Main responsibilities:
- Export, import data and use excel functions on Google Spreadsheet to
link, analyze data and make report.
-  Operate and manage information system on Content Management
System (CMS), Google Drive.
- Make monthly revenue for partners.
- Setup internal tool and Technical assistance for company's partners.
Feb 2017 - Jun 2017
Onaclover Technology Joint Stock Company
Operation & Service Customer Staff
Main responsibilities:
- Receive and handle issues related to partners and customers.
- Analyze customer's data and make reports for COO & CMO.
- Update and maintain database, mailing, inventory, and filing systems,
either by using computers.
- Route, sort, and open incoming mails and prepare outgoing mails and
also answer correspondence.
- Operate and maintain machines in the office, like personal computers,
voice mail systems, facsimile machines, scanners, and photocopiers.
- Arrange appointments, manage calendars, and complete work
schedules.
May 2016 - June 2016
USSH Library
Admin Internship
- Responsible for Using the library computer system to control the
circulation of library stock and give information.
- Understanding enquiries using IT based research tools and the
internet.
- Studying and managing the ways to operate database, website and
network system.
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Experienced in working in a customer service environment. 
- Good level of IT literacy. 
- Ability to exhibit tact & diplomacy when dealing with upset or
aggressive people. 
- Ability to work under pressure on a busy frontline service
- A pleasant manner when dealing with customers and colleagues.
May 2015 - June 2016
Duong Minh English Center
TA/ Teaching Assistant
- Working one-to-one or with small groups of pupils.
- Supporting pupils with learning difficulties or disabilities .
-  Preparing the classroom for lessons.
- Tidying up and keeping the classroom in good order.
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Experienced in working in professional academic environment. 
- Good level of communication.
- Ability to work in speaking-English environment.
Oct 2013 - Feb 2017
University of Social Sciences and Humanities - VNU HCM
Major: Information Management
GPA: 3.3/4
EDUCATION
SQL Query
Know how to use SQL statements & clauses.
SPSS
Know how to use Statistical Package for the Social Sciences
Self - Learning
Able to learn what I want when I want, and how I want effectively.
Analytical Skills
Able to analyze a situation and coming forward with a logical solution.
Detail Oriented
Pay attention to any project detail you responsible for.
Team work
Confident when working in groups under any circumstances.
Problem - Solving
Able to deal with problems calmly and efficiently.
Microsoft Office
Good at Excel, Google Spreadsheet, Word, etc.
Communication
Confident verbal communication skills both Vietnamese and English.
Computer Skills
Proficient in using Microsoft Office applications and specific softwares.
Time Management
Able to set time-lines to achieve certain goals.
SKILLS
